commitResults.messageTitle: Level-0 : Add chatbot skeleton with greeting and exit

commitResults.messageBody:
Implement the ability to store user input as tasks in memory and
display them back when the user types 'list'.

Tasks are stored in a fixed-size array (max 100).

commitResults.messageTitle: Introduce Task class with done status

commitResults.messageBody:
Migrate in-memory store from String[100] to Task[100].
addTask now wraps input into a Task.
list prints Task.toString() which includes status.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-3: Mark as done and unmark with Task class
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduce a Task class to represent individual tasks with a description
and done status. Replace the old String-based storage with Task-based
storage.

Add support for the following user commands:
* `mark N` - mark the N-th task as done
* `unmark N` - revert the N-th task to not done

Add Todo, Deadline, and Event task types by introducing subclasses of a
base Task class (A-Inheritance). Dates/times are treated as plain
strings per spec.

New commands:
* todo <desc>
* deadline <desc> /by <when>
* event <desc> /from <start> /to <end>

Existing commands retained:
* list (shows [T]/[D]/[E] and done status)
* mark N / unmark N
* bye

commitResults.messageTitle: A-TextUiTesting: Add automated text UI tests for Yuri
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduce the text-ui-test harness using the I/O redirection technique.
Includes:
* runtest.sh script configured to compile and run the Yuri main class
* input.txt covering todo, deadline, event, list, mark, unmark, and bye
* EXPECTED.TXT containing the expected output for those commands

This setup allows semi-automated regression testing by comparing the
actual output (ACTUAL.TXT) with the expected output.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-5: Handle errors with custom exceptions
commitResults.messageBody:
Enhance Yuri to validate user inputs and provide friendly error
messages. Introduce a YuriException to signal problems and catch them in
the main loop so the bot continues running after an error.

Handle errors for:
* Empty descriptions in todo/deadline/event
* Missing /by or /from or /to parameters
* Non-numeric or out-of-range indices for mark/unmark
* Unrecognized commands
* Task list overflow

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-6: Delete tasks and use ArrayList storage
commitResults.messageBody:
Add 'delete <n>' command to remove the N-th task (1-based) with a
confirmation block and updated task count. Switch
